She and her husband grow cassava as the main business for the family’s income. Having been in the business for 6 years, they can earn about 22,000 KHR per day to cover the family’s needs. They manage to save about 15,000 KHR each day.

Oern has never been a member of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, before. She is now leading her group to request a loan. As the leader, Oern will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and use a portion of it for labor. She hopes to increase her crop yields to earn a larger income so as to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назира, 47 лет, в разводе, есть сын школьник. У нее средне-специальное техническое образование, работает в районной Архитектуре главным специалистом. Также на протяжении 10 лет в качестве дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством, стартовав с 16,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Назиры, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 коровы и 2 лошади. На ежедневной основе продает молоко. Также есть небольшой огород, где выращивает овощи для собственного потребления. Ежемесячный совокупный доход от бизнеса и заработной платы составляет примерно 17,800 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на содержание семьи и воспитание сына. Поэтому в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Назира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одного бычка. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и увеличение доходов семьи, что позволит накопить на постройку сарая для скота и обучение сына Назиры.
texts.en: Nazira is 47 years old. She is divorced and has a school-age son. She has a secondary vocational education, and works in the district Architecture [office] as a principal specialist. She has also been rearing animals for ten years for income for her family, having started with 16,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Nazira's hard work, at the present time she has two cows and two horses. She sells milk on a daily basis. She also has a small garden where she grows vegetables for her own use. Her gross monthly income from the business and from her salary is about 17,800 som (KGS), but these funds are insufficient to support her family and raise her son. For this reason, in order to develop her business further Nazira has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 25,000 som (KGS) to buy a steer. She plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further expansion of her business and increasing her family's income, which will enable her to save up to build a barn for her livestock and for Nazira's son's education.

loans.use: to buy a steer in order to help bolster her income.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es de la ciudad de Villarrica, es ya una profesional, pero sigue estudiando una especialización para poder procurarse una mejor vida.
Ella de aquí a 4 años se ve como una Dra. Forense y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo profesionalmente.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Maria is from the city of Villarrica. She is already a professional, but she is still pursuing a specialization in order to be able have a better life.

In another 4 years she will be forensic doctor, and will continue to grow professionally.

She is asking for a loan to be able to pay the tuition for her degree, and this way be able to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay the tuition for her degree.

loans.name: Nidia

texts.es:
Nidia es de la ciudad de San Ignacio, está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Agroindustrial, está poniendo su mayor esfuerzo para poder crecer y ser un profesional útil no solo para sí mismo, sino también para los demás.
Ella es una persona mu luchadora, y pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer y cumplir sus anhelos.
texts.en:
Nidia is from the city of San Ignacio. She is pursuing a degree in Agro-Industrial Engineering. She is putting forth her best efforts to grow and become a useful professional, not only for herself but also to others.

She is a very hard-working person. And she is requesting this loan to be able to pay her university tuition fees and, in this way, be able to continue studying as she has been doing so far. 

She is grateful for the opportunity given to her to grow and fulfill her dreams.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition fees.

loans.name: Burulkan

texts.ru: Бурулкан, 55 лет, замужем, есть сын и 2 дочки. Бурулкан в качестве основного дохода занимается сельским хозяйством, стартовав в 2000 году, благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Бурулкан, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 2 коровы, 15 овец и лошадь. Ежемесячный доход составляет до 8,800 сом (KGS). Бурулкан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) для закупки овец для откорма и реализации. Бурулкан намерена расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи.
texts.en: Burulkan is 55 years old. She is married, and has a son and two daughters. Burulkan farms as her main source of income, having started in 2000. Thanks to Burulkan's perseverance, dedication and hard work, today she has two cows, 15 sheep and a horse. Her monthly income is up to 8,800 som (KGS). Burulkan has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy some sheep for fattening and resale. Burulkan intends to expand her business, which will inevitably lead to an increase in her family's capital.

loans.use: to buy additional sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Ly's Group

texts.en:
A rural villager living in Kratie Province’s Snoul District, Ly is 35 years old and married with four children. She and her husband are farmers who has been growing cassava and rubber for three years to make a living. Together, they can earn about US$18 per day from the current business and manage to save US$5 daily for future needs.

This is the third loan for Ly with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for another loan. As the leader, Ly wants to use her portion to buy pesticides to support her cassava and rubber farming. She hopes to increase her farming production to generate more income to improve her family’s lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy pesticides to support her cassava and rubber farming.

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru: Роза, 47 лет, замужем, 2 детей. У нее среднее образование, уже 24 года занимается сельским хозяйством. Сегодня в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 10 овец и 2 лошади. Также на собственном земельном наделе мерою 3,78 Га занимается полеводством, выращивая люцерну, пшеницу и ячмень. Деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль около 18,600 сомов(KGS). Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. В будущем Роза планирует направлять доходы от кредита на развитие своей деятельности.
texts.en: Roza is 47 years old, married, and has two children. She has a secondary education. She has been farming for 24 years. Today she has two cows, ten sheep and two horses. She also grows crops on a 3.78 hectare plot of her own land, growing alfalfa, wheat and barley. Her business brings her a monthly profit of about 18,600 som (KGS). She has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy some cows to increase the size of her herd. In future, Roza plans to direct the proceeds of the loan to the development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase some cows to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Iris

texts.en:
Iris is a thirty-year old single woman from Panglao, Bohol. She sells electronic load to the locals in her place. It has been five years now that she has been engaged in that kind of livelihood. She needs funds to improve her e-loading source of income.

She has requested a loan to purchase e-load, retailer sim, and additional cellphone unit. These will generate a higher income and enable Iris to continue catering to her customers. She could start to expand her livelihood by creating other ways of making use of her resources that are more sustainable.

She is hoping that she will become productive as she continues her day-to-day livelihood activity.

loans.use: to purchase e-load, retailer sim, and additional cellphone unit

loans.name: Asylkul

texts.ru: Асылкул, 53 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Асылкул высшее образование, работает преподавателем в школе. Также занимается сельским хозяйством вот уже 19 лет. В хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 5 овец. Также в наделе есть 1,40 Га земли, где ежегодно сажают картофель, эспарцет и зерновые культуры. Благодаря упорному труду Асылкул, ежемесячный доход составляет 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Асылкул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Асылкул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение ее бизнеса за счет покупки породистых дойных коров.
texts.en: Asylkul is 53 years old and married. She and her husband have raised two children. Asylkul has a higher education, and works as a schoolteacher. She has also farmed for 19 years. She has three cows and five sheep. She also has an allotment of 1.4 hectares of land where she plants potatoes, sainfoin and cereals each year. Thanks to Asylkul's hard work, her monthly income is 7,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, Asylkul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to increase the size of her herd. Asylkul plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in growing her business further by buying some pedigree dairy cows.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Mae

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Meet one of KPP-UMKM’s clients, Mae, who is a 35-year-old married woman. Mae has been selling clothes for five years. Her husband has been a clothier for five years as well.

Mae has asked for a loan of IDR 7,200,000 from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to build a sanitation system at their home to improve access to sanitation and clean water for their family. Her family income is insufficient to build toilets and water sources, but Mae will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank to all lenders.

loans.use: to build a sanitation system at their home to improve access to sanitation and clean water for their family.

loans.name: Cholpon

texts.ru: Чолпон, 51 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитали 4 детей (2 дочери и 2 сына), они самостоятельные живут отдельно. У Чолпон- среднее образование. На протяжении 26 лет занимается сельским хозяйством, свекр выделил корову с теленком и 10 овец в качестве стартового капитала, Чолпон с супругом смогли развить свою деятельность. На сегодняшний день у них есть 6 коров и 13 овец. Есть собственный огород, где Чолпон выращивает овощи и фрукты для собственного потребления. Ежемесячный доход составляет 22,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Чолпон обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 140,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки телят. Доходы от кредита Чолпон планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение ее бизнеса и улучшение условий проживания ее семьи.
texts.en: Cholpon is 51 years old and married. She and her husband have raised four children (two daughters and two sons); they are independent and live separately. Cholpon has a secondary education. She has been farming for 26 years. Her father-in-law gave her a cow with calf and ten sheep as starting capital. Cholpon and her husband have been able to develop their business. Today they have six cows and 13 sheep. They have their own garden where Cholpon grows vegetables and fruits for their own consumption. Her monthly income is 22,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, Cholpon has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 140,000 som (KGS) to increase the size of her herd by buying some calves. Cholpon plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in growing her business further and improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy additional calves in order to increase her herd.
